meanings.definition: The branch of medicine dealing with the anatomy, functions, and diseases of the eye.
meanings.sent1: Ophthalmologies help people with eye problems.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in ophthalmologies treat various eye conditions.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmologies expert could spot an eye issue from a mile away!
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of ophthalmologies was as clear as crystal.
meanings.sent5: Studying ophthalmologies is like exploring the mysteries of the eye.

meanings.definition: The study of the structure, functions, and diseases of the eye.
meanings.sent1: Learning about ophthalmologies teaches us how our eyes work.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in ophthalmologies aim to improve eye health worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for ophthalmologies was truly eye-opening!
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, ophthalmologies shines brightly.
meanings.sent5: Exploring ophthalmologies is like unraveling the secrets of vision.
